source_note: State baseline derived from Kansas Department of Health and Environment (KDHE) Solid Waste Program and city recycling guides; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Composting of yard and food waste is encouraged and regulated under KDHE Solid Waste rules; home composting is exempt from permits.
organics.bin: Green/yard waste cart or compost drop-off site.
organics.notes: Curbside organics collection available in limited cities like Lawrence.
provenance: Kansas Department of Health and Environment Solid Waste Program

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes before placing in bins.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue/mixed recycling bin or drop-off center.
paper_cardboard.notes: Exclude greasy, wet, or waxed cardboard.
provenance: City of Lawrence and Wichita recycling guides

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle glass bottles and jars; rinse and remove lids.
glass_containers.bin: Glass-only bin or community drop-off (not accepted curbside in most cities).
glass_containers.notes: Broken glass and ceramics not accepted.

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and steel/tin cans; rinse before recycling.
metal_containers.notes: No aerosol or paint cans in curbside bins.

plastics.guidance: Recycle bottles, jugs, and tubs labeled #1â€“#2; other plastics depend on local rules.
plastics.notes: Plastic bags, film, and foam are not accepted curbside.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: Kansas has no statewide deposit/refund program for beverage containers.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Recycle in local curbside or drop-off bin.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries through HHW programs or collection sites.
household_batteries.bin: Hazardous waste or battery drop-off center.
household_batteries.notes: Do not dispose of batteries in trash or curbside bins.

e_waste.guidance: E-waste collection events are supported by KDHE grants; recycling not mandated statewide.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at e-waste collection site or event.
e_waste.notes: Accepted items vary; check local listings.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film are not recyclable curbside.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Keep out of recycling bins to prevent contamination.

bulky_items.guidance: Large items must be scheduled for pickup or dropped off at landfill/transfer station.
bulky_items.notes: Fees or scheduled collection days apply in most cities.
provenance: City of Wichita bulky item pickup rules
